issue.title: [C++] Rename json.h
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3981](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3981). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This JSON format is mostly used for integration testing, it's not meant for outside consumption. Perhaps rename the header to `json-integration.h`?

comments.body:
